name: Random Platform attempt
description:
A small one room game where you jump around trying to get to the pink circle. I made this to expand on some basic random generation that Tom Francis teaches in his youtube video series teaching people how to make their first game with no experience.

If you get stuck there is a gun to shoot the blocks away and ammo to refill it. You cant finish every level, but most will be completable. If you need to restart just hit R it should generate a new level every time.

(made a small change added a start screen which forces you to click in the screen, previous version needed a click to enable control but that cost a bullet so added the ugly blue start screen to get around this!)
